version.change: Added simulation of ship death animation (gib & mount animation)
Added support for Mac Command key in hotkeys (untested)
Several bug fixes and interface improvements
Added undo/redo system -- see changelog for currently undoable operations
Gib angular velocity modification, mount-gib linking
Added search functionality to weapon/drone/augment selection dialogs
Fixed a bug that would cause shield image to not be exported
Added keybind modification via Settings window
Added automated database reloading when you've installed mods with SMM
Added drag-reordering of items in Ship Overview window
Added enemy window image for enemy ships instead of hangar
Plethora of bug fixes, tweaks and improvements
Disabled station editing on enemy ships
Changed tooltips to stay until dismissed by the user
Weapon mounts can now display any weapon without actually changing the loadout
A lot of minor tweaks and fixes
Fixed bugs with newly created rooms and mounts
Split images tab from properties tool into its own tool
Weapon/drone slots allow up to 8 slots, but display a warning when going over 4
